message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. While I can't disclose specific details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you at a special price of $2000000.  This is a significant discount from its true value and an opportunity to acquire something truly remarkable. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.
